text: Marella Agnelli (, born Donna Marella Caracciolo di Castagneto (); 4 May 1927 – 23 February 2019)Almanach de Gotha. Gotha: Justus Perthes. 1942. pp. 398–399. was an Italian noblewoman, art collector and socialite. She was the widow Fiat chairman Gianni Agnelli. She often appeared in the fashion magazine Vogue. She was named to the International Best Dressed List Hall of Fame in 1963. ==References== Category:1927 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Italian businesspeople Category:Italian princes and princesses Category:People from Florence
title: Marella Agnelli
